long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QrWind is an express online service for generating your own QR Codes with one simple click.

Work offline, no special permission required.

Customize colour and logo of the QR code width edit feature.

There are following 7 languages of interface for your choose.

Arabic, English, Spanish, Chinese(Simplified), Chinese(Traditional), Japanese, Korean, Portugues
